Episodes.Title: Thomas, Percy and the Coal
Episodes.Plot: Thomas claims to have the best paintwork on Sodor and brags to Percy and Toby about it.

Episodes.Title: Cows
Episodes.Plot: Edward has an accident. Gordon and Henry tease him about it when they learn why, but Edward has the last laugh.

Episodes.Title: Bertie's Chase
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is late, Edward is impatient and the passengers are cross; dashing Bertie races to the rescue.

Episodes.Title: Saved from Scrap
Episodes.Plot: Edward helps save a traction engine named Trevor from being used for scrap.

Episodes.Title: Old Iron
Episodes.Plot: James feels very proud of himself until some boys meddle with his controls and he learns a valuable lesson.

Episodes.Title: Thomas and Trevor
Episodes.Plot: Thomas and Trevor become friends and spend the day working together. test

Episodes.Title: Percy and the Signal
Episodes.Plot: Gordon and James pull a trick on Percy to teach him a lesson for being a joker.

Episodes.Title: Duck Takes Charge
Episodes.Plot: The new engine, known as Duck for his waddle, arrives and Percy is told to show him around the yard; Duck and Percy block the entrance to the sheds.

Episodes.Title: Percy and Harold
Episodes.Plot: Percy and Harold the helicopter have a race and Percy wins.

Episodes.Title: The Runaway
Episodes.Plot: Thomas has a faulty hand brake and cannot be stopped.

Episodes.Title: Percy Takes the Plunge
Episodes.Plot: Thomas gives Percy a warning about Danger signs, Perry takes no notice and soon learns the lesson.

Episodes.Title: Pop Goes the Diesel
Episodes.Plot: Duck orders the big engines around and they are glad when oily Diesel arrives.

Episodes.Title: Dirty Work
Episodes.Plot: Diesel and Duck do not get along.
